mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.material_name AS "materialName", a.material_code AS "materialCode"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM archive_material a
AND a.material_code LIKE '%'||#{materialCode}||'%' '%'+#{materialCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
AND a.material_name LIKE '%'||#{materialName}||'%' '%'+#{materialName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
